title: ToolRegistry Audit
verdict: PASS - ToolRegistry has comprehensive 85-parameter CuttingTool interface, material cross-refs via ISO groups, 12 source modules

registry_overview.loading_pattern: JSON data files from extracted/tools/ directories

key_sub_interfaces.ToolGeometry: 14 fields: diameter, overall_length, flute_length, shank_diameter, flutes, helix_angle, rake_angle, relief_angle, corner_radius, chamfer_angle, taper_angle, point_angle, edge_preparation, edge_radius, chip_breaker fields
key_sub_interfaces.ToolCoating: 8 fields: type, thickness, hardness, max_temperature, friction_coefficient, color, multi_layer, layer_count
key_sub_interfaces.ToolPerformance: recommendations by ISO group (speed_sfm, feed_ipt, doc_max, woc_max, coolant), expected_life, wear_pattern, max limits, achievable quality
key_sub_interfaces.ToolHolder: interface, gauge_length, overhang, balance_grade, max_rpm, pullout_force

tool_schema.material_cross_ref: material_groups[] field references ISO material groups (P/M/K/N/S/H/X)

key_modules.purpose: Usui, diffusion, adhesive, abrasive, crater wear

cross_references.tool_to_material: CuttingTool.material_groups[] maps to ISO groups (P=Steel, M=Stainless, K=Cast, N=Non-ferrous, S=Super, H=Hard, X=Specialty)
cross_references.tool_to_performance: ToolPerformance.recommendations keyed by ISO group with speed/feed/doc/woc ranges
